title: Lol since when did kogmaw become op
body:
I never see him nor did I ever see anyone complain about him but a couple days ago someone made a "kogmaw is op" post that got a lot of upvotes now everyone is shitting on kogmaw

What the hell

replies.body: Kog with a decent support can be annoying, because of the ardent censor and the other sup items. Imo, AP Kog was a way more interesting champion, but they killed it to preserve a one button rightclicker playstyle which is honestly retarded.
Ever since circle jerk started farming upvotes after they nerfed cait.

Supports make him broken, ardent makes him broken.

Basically support itemization needs to be nerfed overall + a few of their top tier champs.

ADC have been broken and absolutely mandatory for the game since season 1! 
Sollution: Make supports even more useless for anything but being a buff to the ADC. 

Great Idea.
Well, he is an ADC, so... Season 1 i would say.
He's been broken forever if he has a team supporting him, which thankfully doesn't happen often in solo que.
i never had much problems dealing with him but ofc when i see him i build {{item:3194}} to cheese through his w
It's literally only for high-elo, but Kog is indeed one of the most broken adcs in the game atm
people have to cry about someone when everyone else is getting nerfed.
